entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Plains 10:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 2.0°C
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
